supported_content_types.description: HTML content for rich formatting or UI elements. Requires a sandboxed renderer for safety.

notes: Content must be Base64 encoded. Use type='image/png;encoding=base64'.
Content must be Base64 encoded. Use type='image/jpeg;encoding=base64'.
Content must be Base64 encoded. Use type='image/gif;encoding=base64'.

supported_content_types.description: Mermaid diagram definition (https://mermaid.js.org/). Requires a Mermaid renderer.
Vega-Lite chart specification (https://vega.github.io/vega-lite/). Requires a Vega-Lite renderer.
